infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app uses the camera to allow you to take and upload photos and videos to your posts.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app uses the photo library to allow you to select and upload photos and videos for your posts.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This app uses the microphone to allow you to record videos with audio to upload to your posts.
